imagesettings: Brightness , Contrast , Saturability , Sharpness etc. are adjustable by the client or IE browser
remoteaccess: remote configuration, browsing , recording, playback and PTZ control can be implemented by built-in IE Web client or CMS, DDNS
generalfunction: FLC , 3 stream encoding , heartbeat mechanism, mirror function, password protection, privacy area, watermark etc.
interface: Internet InterfaceOne RJ45 10M , 100M Self-adaptive Ethernet port
intelligentalarm: motion detection, covering alarm , network connection failure , IP address conflict
mobilesurveillance: Support iPhone OS3.0 above , Android 2.2.above , Symbian , windows mobile
